sentences.english: Conclusion Gram positive organisms are major pathogens of bacteremia in critically ill patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论革兰阳性球菌是危重病患者菌血症的重要致病菌。

sentences.english: For extreme diseases, extreme methods of cure, as to restriction, are most suitable.
sentences.chinese: 对于重病，就克制治疗而言，最宜采取极端之疗法。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论枳实消痞方能改善危重病患者胃肠道障碍。

sentences.english: There may be no turning back for life-limiting illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 生命垂危的重病有可能不能转危为安了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of intensive insulin therapy on the critical illness patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究强化胰岛素治疗在危重病患者中的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The medicine of critical disease is a clinical discipline that gradually sprang up in the late 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 危重病医学是在60年代末逐步兴起的临床学科。

sentences.english: Amy's pitiless step-mother refused to look after her when she was seriously ill.
sentences.chinese: 艾咪那个铁石心肠的继母在她生重病时不肯照料她。

sentences.english: A hard illness kept him in bed for a whole year.
sentences.chinese: 重病使他整整一年卧床不起。

sentences.english: Those who are failing in old age, even though they are not seriously ill, can also receive this sacrament.
sentences.chinese: 年老力衰的人，虽无重病，也可以领病人傅油圣事。

sentences.english: He ended up working with the terminally and critically ill children.
sentences.chinese: 他在对那些垂死的，重病的孩子们的工作上鞠躬尽瘁。

sentences.english: Sepsis is one of common critical diseases.
sentences.chinese: 脓毒症是常见的危重病。

sentences.english: He was never terribly sick, but he always thought he was.
sentences.chinese: 他从来没什么大病，但他总认为自己重病缠身。

sentences.english: Gloria has a serious disease and is forbidden to go anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 葛洛利亚患有重病，什么地方都不许去。
一场重病夺去了他的生命。

sentences.english: Suitable for seriously ill and the Old Kuala District Shed grab early cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 适宜重病区和老瓜区拱棚抢早栽培。

sentences.english: I am sorry, my son is very sick, he can't receive you.
sentences.chinese: 真是对不起各位，小儿身染重病不能见客。

definition: to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
to fall ill/to be stricken with an illness
to fall gravely ill, never to recover (idiom)
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to accumulate work causes sickness (idiom); to fall ill from constant overwork
